## Station Data

How to load in one station's worth of data

```{r}
dat_one_station <- read_csv("https://services.pca.state.mn.us/api/v1/groundwater/monitoring-stations/results?stationId=1000013995&format=csv")
```

Loop through select stations to acquire station data

```{r, eval=FALSE}
stationSub <- stations7county %>%
  slice(1:500)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
allStationData = tibble()

for(i in stationSub$stationId){
  
  station_data_one_station = read_csv(paste0("https://services.pca.state.mn.us/api/v1/groundwater/monitoring-stations/results?stationId=", i, "&format=csv"))
  
  allStationData <- rbind(allStationData, station_data_one_station)
}
#save(allStationData, file="data/allStationData2.RData")
```
